fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 lost 186.80 points or 1.02% to settle at 18,069. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, jumped 4.79% to 12.30. HDFC Bank, ICICI Bank and IndusInd Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The May 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 25 May 2023.
